content: been visited here for many times with different circle of friends.. always amazing..

I first ate nearby and found this art gallery after looking for the surrounding area. Very good, I experienced an artistic visual feast for free. I think sometimes I should look at this deep thing. Although I don't understand it very much, I also enjoy it. It is probably on the soul. The artwork and paintings are beautiful and worth a visit.

The place that was originally a abandoned quarry was renovated and became a local tourist attraction. You can experience astronomy, it became a wonderful date course for lovers, and it also became a shelter for the surrounding elderly. There is an entrance fee, but it is not too burdensome.. Let's take the cable car up.
spring experience in pocheon art valley with my sister❤️
It was amazing that the scenery that I only saw on SNS can be seen in Pocheon! Good to visit for a while
It was too hot in summer, but the scenery was art.
I felt so yes and not Korea.
went here one time and it was so amazing

Baochuan Art Valley is a good place to stretch your body and mind. It was originally a granite quarry, and later stopped granite production, and became the first cultural and artistic space for environmental regeneration in South Korea.
Very good and recommended to acquaintances
